title: Avenir's Serif Sister?
content: Anyone have suggestions for a serif face that plays well with Avenir?
author: dylan

comments.content: Maybe this [good ol' thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125203323/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/54609.html?1101982524) could give you some ideas?
I've decided to use Sabon, in case that helps anyone else in the future.
